REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0261 reute b f BC-GROUPE-BRUXELLES-LAMB 04-01 0053

TEXT.TITLE: GROUPE BRUXELLES LAMBERT PROFIT UP
TEXT.BODY: Net consolidated profit after deduction for minorities 6.52 billion francs vs 5.40 billion. Non-consolidated net profit 3.46 billion francs vs 3.05 billion. Note - Results for year 1986. Company's full name is Groupe Bruxelles Lambert SA <LAMB.BR>. Proposed net final dividend on ordinary shares 70 francs vs 65 to take total net payment for year to 120 francs vs 110. REUTER
